welcome_description_before_link: This starter Vite project includes a minimal setup. If you want to learn more on Mantine + Vite integration follow
welcome_description_after_link: . To get started edit pages/Home.page.tsx file.

card_one.title: Precision Scanning
card_one.description: Advanced algorithms detect broken links across markdown files, documentation, and code comments with pinpoint accuracy.

card_two.title: Automated Reports
card_two.description: Generate comprehensive reports with detailed breakdowns, fix suggestions, and priority rankings for efficient maintenance.

card_three.title: GitHub Integration
card_three.description: Seamlessly integrate with your GitHub workflow through Actions, webhooks, and automated pull request creation.

card_four.title: Open Source
card_four.description: Completely open source and community-driven. Contribute, customize, and extend to fit your project's needs.
